sense.def:
To graft a part of one plant onto another
pomeni stakniti dela dveh rastlin, da bi naprej rasla skupaj in postala ena sama rastlina.

To graft one idea or system onto another
pomeni poskusiti združiti eno zamisel ali sistem z drugim.

seg.quote: ...modern federal structures grafted on to ancient cultural divisions.

sense.def:
To graft a piece of healthy tissue to a damaged part of your body
pomeni z zdravniško operacijo pripojiti kos zdravega tkiva na poškodovan del telesa in ga tako nadomestiti.

seg.quote: Laverne had skin grafts on her thighs.
